  physical_appearance: This is a toran or a doorway hanging. It features a cotton weave with embroidery work. The toran is decorated with stylized depictions of birds
 animals
 foliage
 and deities. There is a sewn-on inscription on the center-right of the hanging. The shape of the toran is irregular
 with a rectangular top and nine dangling panels along the bottom.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a toran or a doorway hanging. It features a cotton weave with embroidery work. The toran is decorated with stylized depictions of birds, animals, foliage, and deities. There is a sewn-on inscription on the center-right of the hanging. The shape of the toran is irregular, with a rectangular top and nine dangling panels along the bottom.
